Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: White/silver object, elliptical, moving silently, quickly SSE, then changed directions and disappeared.
divs: sighting detailsworking on my back porch at noon, i spied a white\silver object moving sse just past a neighbor's tree. it was round, slightly elliptical to the naked eye, like a fat blimp or pinched orb, but completely silent and moving very quickly. it seemed solid. it hovered for a second and changed direction from its slight ascent sse, to a steady altitude heading ssw. my first thought was a border drone, but it was far too big and round to be such, also silent for how close it was. i live in a town where air traffic is very rare, and the jets and helicopters that do fly over town are loud loud loud. i retrieved my phone and took a few hurried pictures before it went behind the tree. i ran around to the other side of the tree and glimpsed it briefly before it disappeared, heading west again. when i looked at the pictures, there was also a triangular object captured in one photo, but i did not see or notice it during the sighting.
